name: Carlos Mendoza
title: Spanish Language Expert
description: Carlos has over 10 years of experience teaching Spanish to students of all levels. He is passionate about helping learners achieve fluency through practical and engaging lessons.

name: Sofia Rodriguez
title: Bilingual Instructor (English & Spanish)
description: Sofia focuses on conversational Spanish, helping students build confidence in speaking and understanding the language in real-life situations.

name: Javier López
title: Cultural and Language Enthusiast
description: Javier combines Spanish language lessons with cultural insights, making learning not just educational but also immersive and fun.

name: Isabella Martín
title: Certified Spanish Tutor
description: With a background in linguistics, Isabella specializes in teaching Spanish grammar and writing skills, ensuring her students gain a strong foundation.
